preferSingleLine.description: If arrays and objects should collapse to a single line if it would be below the line width.

locked.description: Whether the configuration is not allowed to be overriden or extended.

lineWidth.description: The width of a line the printer will try to stay under. Note that the printer may exceed this width in certain cases.

indentWidth.description: The number of characters for an indent.

useTabs.description: Whether to use tabs (true) or spaces (false).

newLineKind.description: The kind of newline to use.

oneOf.description: For each file, uses the newline kind found at the end of the last line.
Uses the system standard (ex. crlf on Windows).

commentLine.forceSpaceAfterSlashes.description: Forces a space after slashes.  For example: `// comment` instead of `//comment`

oneOf.description: Always format with trailing commas. Beware: trailing commas can cause many JSON parsers to fail.
Use trailing commas in JSONC files and do not use trailing commas in JSON files.
Keep the trailing comma if it exists.

jsonTrailingCommaDirectories.description: When `trailingCommas` is `jsonc`, treat these directories as containing JSONC files (ex. `[".vscode"]`.

jsonTrailingCommaFiles.description: When `trailingCommas` is `jsonc`, treat these files as JSONC and use trailing commas (ex. `["tsconfig.json"]`).

deno.description: Top level configuration that sets the configuration to what is used in Deno.

ignoreNodeCommentText.description: The text to use for an ignore comment (ex. `// dprint-ignore`).
